All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Army
Keeps a collection of units in ArrayList.
Battle
Responsible for simulating a battle between armyOne and ArmyTwo.
CavalryUnit
Unit with 20 attack and 12 armor.
CommanderUnit
custom version of CavalryUnit.
CSVController
Responsible for saving and retrieving army in a .csv file.
FileController
saves and retrieves a Tournament from a file.
InfantryUnit
represents an infantry unit.
Main
Represents the non-JavaFX main-class who's sole responsibility is to provide a non-JavaFX entry point to the application.
MainWindowApp
The Main window of the application.
MainWindowAppController
The main controller of the application.
RangedUnit
Represents a range unit based on unit.
Unit
Super class responsible for units in army has modified toString().
UnitDetailsDialog
A dialog used to get the necessary information about a Unit from the user, in order to be able to create a Unit instance to be added to the register.
UnitDetailsDialog.Mode
The mode of the dialog.
UnitFactory
